Question
========
  
A random sample of n = 36 scores is drawn from a population. Which of the following distributions is normally distributed? 
Answerlist
----------

* The scores in the sample form a normal distribution.
* The scores in the population form a normal distribution.
* The distribution of sample averages for samples of size n = 36 constitutes a normal distribution.
* None of the above distributions need be normally distributed.
